text: The Peache Trust is an Anglican body formed in 1877. It owns the advowson (the right to appoint the vicar) for a number of Anglican churches in England, and is responsible for selecting and appointing appropriate candidates as vicar for the churches in its trust. it held the advowson for 45 churches. ==References== Category:Church of England societies and organisations Category:Anglican organizations established in the 19th century Category:Organizations established in 1877
title: Peache Trust
